reviewText: Love this DVD!  It is so creative and taught by the most enthusiastic PE teacher that keeps the students engaged in an exercise journey.  As the teacher tells a "story"  he has the students do exercises "hold in the plank position so you don't touch the hot lava"  or the students do crunches as they sit in their "space ships"  and go "hyper speed and slow down".  Great for grades K-3rd
I have many Christy Lane products and love all of them!  This was an ingenious way to use your imagination for a complete workout!  Good Job!!!
The background is always the same, I was expecting it to be more like a movie where children could watch planets and stars passing by as they exercise.
